item.val: Special Dive trip present by SEASIR
The only diving service with English, Mandarin, Cantonese and Japanese speaking Instructor in Okinawa
Special Dive trip present by SEASIR
Please contact us by e-mail: english@seasir.com, we will provide the latest information for you.

In Okinawa beside the famous Kerama islands, here are a few highly recommended island in Okinawa with individual unique seascape and marine life that are special selected by our SEASIR dive team. Our team would like to share all this dive site and explore with you.

By all means for the safety we required all diver who wanted to participate this special trip have to join SEASIR daily diving trip to Kerama islands first, consider as the check dive or for safety observation purpose. You must have at least 100 dive experience only we could accept your booking for all this special dive trip.

• Individual or group Diver
  • Advanced Open Water Diver with smoothly free descending skill, good control of Neutral buoyancy
  • Over 100+ logged dives
  • Check dive at Kerama island is required, if you couldn’t pass check dive, please join the Kerama daily diving trip

Every year we assign our instructor to overseas diving and after all the feedback, here we choose the right and ideal dive destination for our guest. Every of the listed destination is highly recommended by the Service, Environment, Safety and So much to see and try. Check out the list and email us, let us tell you the story of the destination.

• SEASIR staffs on-site service.
  • Individual and group guests are both welcomed, advance booking required.
